name: SwiftDeskAPI
description: A REST API endpoint for Swift Media's Technical Support Desk application.
author: Tsegaselassie Tadesse <tsegaselassi@gmail.com>

attributes.name: first_name
attributes.desc: The first name of the user.

attributes.name: last_name
attributes.desc: The last name of the user.

attributes.name: email
attributes.desc: The email address of the user, will serve as the username for login.

attributes.name: telephone
attributes.desc: The telephone number of the user.

attributes.name: password
attributes.desc: The password for the user account.

attributes.name: created_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the user account was created.

attributes.name: modified_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the user account was last modified.

attributes.name: name
attributes.desc: The name of the role.

attributes.name: created_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the role was created.

attributes.name: modified_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the role was last modified.

attributes.name: resource
attributes.desc: The API resoruce to get access to.

attributes.name: actions
attributes.desc: The API action(s) allowed to perform on the resource.

attributes.name: created_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the user account was created.

attributes.name: modified_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the user account was last modified.

attributes.name: name
attributes.desc: The name of the location.

attributes.name: latitude
attributes.desc: The latitudinal coordinate number of the location.

attributes.name: latitude
attributes.desc: The latitudinal coordinate number of the location.

attributes.name: representatives
attributes.desc: The representatives to contact regarding the location.

attributes.name: created_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the user account was created.

attributes.name: modified_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the user account was last modified.

attributes.name: issue_type
attributes.desc: The type of issue; i.e. related to Kiosk or Tablet.

attributes.name: floor
attributes.desc: The floor of the building on which the device is located.

attributes.name: direction
attributes.desc: The direction in which the device is placed on the floor; i.e. left or right.

attributes.name: has_wifi
attributes.desc: If the device has WiFi access or not.

attributes.name: wifi_ip
attributes.desc: The IP address of the WiFi access point, if available.

attributes.name: lan_ip
attributes.desc: The IP address of the LAN port, if available.

attributes.name: server_ip
attributes.desc: The IP address of the server, if available.

attributes.name: manual_enabled
attributes.desc: If the device was to be powered on manually.

attributes.name: auto_enabled
attributes.desc: If the device was to be powered on automatically.

attributes.name: auto_start_enabled
attributes.desc: If the device was to be powered on automatically.

attributes.name: access_address
attributes.desc: The access address of the device.

attributes.name: has_genuine_windows
attributes.desc: If the device has genuine windwos operating system installed.

attributes.name: software_error
attributes.desc: The error message shown if there is a software error output.

attributes.name: was_powered_off
attributes.desc: If the device was powered off when visited.

attributes.name: reported_to
attributes.desc: The person to which the issue was reported first.

attributes.name: reported_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the report of the issue was made.

attributes.name: host_ev_for
attributes.desc: The host for which the electronic evaluation is setup for.

attributes.name: repeated_problems
attributes.desc: The list of repleated problems reported.

attributes.name: detailed_information
attributes.desc: The detailed information on the problems reported.
attributes.example: There is interruption of power on the building.

attributes.name: created_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the user account was created.

attributes.name: modified_on
attributes.desc: The date on which the user account was last modified.
